name: Acreage Coin
public_notice: Acreage Coin (ACG) has moved to Ethereum chain with a contract address 0x76306f029f8f99effe509534037ba7030999e3cf . Website has changed from https://acreagecoin.io/ to https://acreagecoin.com/
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Acreage is the intuitive blockchain and future marketplace solution evolving how site surveys are stored and exchanged. It will allow users to utilize ACR as a means to purchase uploaded site surveys that are otherwise lost or discarded.
A marketplace through which surveys are recycled and exchanged from owners to buyers is the inspiration of the Acreage project.

ico_data.short_desc: The Acreage project will disrupt the market by incentivizing site survey owners to digitize their site surveys for a price in ACR.
